name: incendiary
description: Material from an incendiary round, useful in constructing incendiary ammunition.

name: mattress
description: This is a single, or twin, sized mattress.

name: down mattress
description: This is a single, or twin, sized down filled mattress.

name: fuse
description: A piece of fuse, long enough to give you enough time to get away from most explosions.

name: rubber sole
description: This is a sole made from rubber, usually found on the bottoms of boots.  Can be used for making actual boots.

A polygonal ceramic ballistic plate with a slightly concave profile.  Its inner surface is coated with Ultra High Molecular Weight Polyethylene, and is labelled "TOP", while its outer surface is labelled "STRIKE FACE".  This is intended to be worn in a ballistic vest and can withstand several high energy rifle rounds before breaking.

A polygonal ceramic ballistic plate with a slightly concave profile.  "STRIKE FACE" is printed on its outer surface.  This is designed to be worn in the sides of a plate carrier and can withstand several high energy rifle rounds before breaking.
